Class.name: EasyCSP.Validator.Validators.InForeignKeyList
Class.Description:
Ensure that the value in attribute.value exists in attribute.fkList. This is a double-check that the contents of a select box return are truly valid. This serves as bullet-proofing and penetration prevention by someone creating a form offline with hard-coded data in an attempt to jam junk into the database.
To accomplish the check, add "InForeignKeyList" as a validation rule for a field using the foreign key name-value-pair list to populate a select box.

Method.name: run
Method.Implementation:
attribute = @ME->init(parameters) value = raise(attribute->value)
display = '"' : ereplace(attribute->fkValues->values(), @fm, '", "') : '"'
numberOfValuesToTest = dcount(value,@fm)
validValues = attribute->fkValues->keys()
for idx = 1 to numberOfValuesToTest test = value<idx> find test in validValues setting amc else attribute->addError(@ME->%ClassName() : ": '" : test: "' must be one of " : display) end Next
return attribute
